markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thorned Seedpod](/Feats.aspx?ID=4507) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 69 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Seedpod](/Feats.aspx?ID=4497)

</column>

---

When your seedpods [strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89) a felling blow, they burst into viciously thorny vines. When you critically succeed at a seedpod Strike, vines twist and stab your foe, dealing 1d4 [persistent](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) piercing damage.
name: Thorned Seedpod

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Thorned Seedpod Source Player Core pg. 69 2.0 Prerequisites Seedpod --- When your seedpods strike a felling blow, they burst into viciously thorny vines. When you critically succeed at a seedpod Strike, vines twist and stab your foe, dealing 1d4 persistent piercing damage.
